TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Cipawkan, title = Cipawkan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cipawkan} }

S.FORM: alang Cipawkan ga niya mki sku Karing Keng atu Karing Si, kwara sali buwan nya ga 2,448 buwan, 6,662 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 16% kyan ku 1,051 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 84% kyan ku 5,611 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 13%, Truku 2%, binah lihuyan s'uli 0.5%. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Cipawkan hya' ga bsilung. tay 'zil na Cipawkan hya' ga rgyax. tay mkyahu' na Cipawkan hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Cipawkan hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Cipawkan hya' ga Kenuy. tay mkyahu' na Cipawkan hya' ga Cibarbaran. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 2 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Cipawkan ga niya mki sko Karing Keng ato Karing Si, kwara sali bowan nya ga 2,448 bowan, 6,662 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 16% kyan ko 1,051 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 84% kyan ko 5,611 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 13%, Troko 2%, binah lihoyan s'oli 0.5%. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Cipawkan hya' ga bsilong. tay 'zil na Cipawkan hya' ga rgyax. tay mkyaho' na Cipawkan hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Cipawkan hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Cipawkan hya' ga Kenoy. tay mkyaho' na Cipawkan hya' ga Cibarbaran. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 2 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
